channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 29th April
item.description:
NWD with give an take plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level difference please bring x4 2 meters barriers out and place around defect plus x8 sandbags to make safe (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 29th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take stats required please replace x1 broken rocking dropped kerb stone 900x150x30mm 10x5 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
